findings.liver: Normal in size and echotexture, smooth contour, no focal mass, trace fluid.
findings.bile_ducts: No biliary dilation, CBD measures 0.4 cm.
findings.gallbladder: Distended with mild wall-thickening and edema, multiple echogenic gallstones, no obstructing stone, no pericholecystic fluid.
findings.pancreas: Poorly visualized, normal visualized pancreatic body.
findings.spleen: Enlarged, measuring 15 cm, increased from prior measure of 12.5 cm.
findings.kidneys: Right kidney: 11.4 cm, left kidney: 11.7 cm with simple cysts.

laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Spleen enlargement from 12.5 cm to 15 cm.
